workItems.title: Picks and Orderlines are not same when orderline split is false - SB 3.1.X (ok to fix in 3.4~3.5)
implementation - RUI update for group pick improvement
1 : add a button in RUI top for release wheel during picking and other screens

connection to redis are not managed properly
1: Optimize TSP Path by Limiting or altering the frequency of TSP recalculations.

Fix all the ES traces which are being dropped across sites
